scripts.heroku-postbuild-full: truffle migrate --compile-all --reset --network rinkeby && cd web-app && npm i && npm i --only=dev && npm build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: truffle compile --all; cd web-app && npm i && npm i --only=dev && npm run build
scripts.web3j:linux: ./tools/web3j-3.4.0/bin/web3j truffle generate ./build/contracts/Wallet.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts;./tools/web3j-3.4.0/bin/web3j truffle generate ./build/contracts/Factory.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts;./tools/web3j-3.4.0/bin/web3j truffle generate ./build/contracts/FactoryProxy.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts
scripts.web3j:darwin: ./tools/web3j-3.4.0/bin/web3j truffle generate ./build/contracts/Wallet.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts; ./tools/web3j-3.4.0/bin/web3j truffle generate ./build/contract/Factory.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts; ./tools/web3j-3.4.0/bin/web3j truffle generate ./build/contract/FactoryProxy.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts
scripts.web3j:win32: tools\web3j-3.4.0\bin\web3j truffle generate ./build/contracts/Wallet.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts & tools\web3j-3.4.0\bin\web3j truffle generate ./build/contracts/Factory.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts & tools\web3j-3.4.0\bin\web3j truffle generate ./build/contracts/FactoryProxy.json -o ./android-app/app/src/main/java -p com.kirobo.smartwallet.Contracts
